akn:section.akn:heading: Removal of directors by judicial proceeding.

akn:content.akn:p: The Superior Court may remove a director of the corporation from office in a proceeding commenced by or in the right of the corporation if the court finds that:
A shareholder proceeding on behalf of the corporation under subsection (a) of this section shall comply with all of the requirements of part D of subchapter V of this chapter, except ยง 29-305.51(1).
The Superior Court, in addition to removing the director, may bar the director from reelection for a period prescribed by the court.
This section shall not limit the equitable powers of the Superior Court to order other relief.
